thread.title: Richard Wiegard
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Richard Wiegard

author: Richard Wiegard
title: Richard Wiegard
text: As my subject suggests I frankly have no idea what Driver Support is or can do for my PC. However, my unit was performing extremely slow so I elected to try your service. I honestly can't tell whether I benefited or not. Sorry, but that's the honest truth.
